p.add: Invoice of goods sent to mines by Moses Austin. Commerce.

div1.p: Invoice of Goods sent to the Mines.

10 pr 3 point blankets 3 5/8 Ells linen 1/75 Did Morrel for 10 pr 2 1/2 point do hauling load 10 pr 2 1/2 point do 4 Ells bagging 2 pr 2 1/2 do do 42 lb Copperas 2 Cades [Caddies?] 46 lb Brimstone 4 ells Cotton Baging 9 lb Pewter---------- 1$} 1 pr 8/4 Rose blankets 1 Pocket Knife------$ 75} paid Rodney 1 pr 9/4 do 1 Red border Hndkf $2 pd Peter 1 pr 7/4 do Gouro(?) 1 pr 5/4 do 2 ps linen Coars N° 71. C plates 1 ps Lancastter sheeting N° 2
Invoice of Goods sent to the Mines—Continued.

1 Doz frying panns 1 1/2 lb thread N° 9 2 ps stroud 2 lb Coars thread 1 ps Duffil 1/4 lb black silk 11 Ells Corduroy 6 3/4 lb soap 8 Ells table linen 7 ps rusia sheeting 7 1/8 Ells Yellow flannel 1 lb Brown Thread 14 5/8 ells blue Velvet 3 ps Madrass Handkf N° 9 and 7 N° 1 ps Hendal Cottons Say 24 handkf 3 ps Callico 6 Netted shawls 3 pad Locks 5 Yallow Muslin do 1 Do penknives 5 Blue Borderd do 1 Doz pocket knives 5 White ground do 1 Door Lock 3 Canton Handkf 3 small D° 200 flints 8 1/8 Ells red stroud 15 Chamber potts 1 blew Perres cloth 4 1/2 doz bowles 2 ps Muzlin 4 Doz plates 1 ps White linen towel 4 Doz tumblers 1 ps Cottonade 62 lb 10 ozi pewter 1 ps blue guina 2 Silk pattern pantaloons 1 Doz linnen Handkf red border 3 yds Cambrick Muzlin 20 1/4 Ells White flannel 3 8/4 Augers 2 packs pins 2 6/4 do 1 lb pins 3 4/4 do 1 Doz Croked Combs 2 3/4 do 1 D° fine Combs 1/2 Doz Chissels 1 D° Coars D° 4 pr H (?) hinges 1 Doz Wide tapes 21 1/2 pr do for store house 1 D° Narrow D° 5 Ells White flannel for Mrs Austin 5 hundred Needles 1 pr Cheet [Check?]—40 Ells— 1 Gross [mutilated] 2 lb Spice 1/3 Doz gartering
[Endorsed by Moses Austin:]Memorandu, of goods from Village
